Posts.Content: yendeau wrote: Just had a second mammogram and a sonogram (looks weird spelled this way). Found a concerning structural anomaly about 1.39 cm. Next step is a biopsy. I am concerned and worried, but am thinking what is, is. I am confused as to what to do about a second opinion if the biopsy is positive. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Waiting for Biopsy yendeau Trvler
